# Tutorial Introduction

This is a tutorial for setting up a basic inventory application using the Carolina framework.

It will mostly involve database connections, user accounts, and routing. Users will be able to login and create or delete items from an inventory.

To get started, you will end a Linux environment with Node.js 10+.
